main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were observed at Robins Air Force Base, Georgia, on September 23, 1952, described as big bright lights in the sky.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 10-15 seconds where a round white light was seen brightening the sky,The reports mentioned 9-15 objects observed over a duration of 3 to 4 minutes,One object was noted to be the size of a star and emitted a bright red color,The object hovered silently at an altitude estimated at 12,000 feet with no sound or other peculiarities detected,The lights maintained a steady brightness and were seen from different locations within the base.
witness description: Two civilians and two military personnel reported the sighting.
